Two things:

  1. It's not Blizzy's fault if a mod has an old version of the Toolbar.
  2. Generally you're only installing mods as they update, and in theory they should have the latest toolbar when they update (or, again, it's their fault and not Blizzy's). The only time you'd have to worry about an old toolbar in a plugin is (again if the mod makers are any good at this stuff) is when you're installing something new to you that hasn't been updated for a while, so is out of date. Those times are rare enough that I don't see why it shoudln't be up to you to make sure you're not screwing it up
